availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Bryant Honnaker (Shelby County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Isaac Honnaker and Elizabeth Honnaker. Married to Mary H. Armstrong in Shelby County, Kentucky on December 13, 1855. Father of Francis M. Honnaker, Jene Honnaker, and Fanny Honnaker. Resident of Franklin County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident of Shelby County, Kentucky in 1864.

ab.bibl:
KYR-0001-004-0563.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Shelby County Marriages, Film #000259275.

Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin, District 2, 85A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 1, 68A.
